cargoShipDetected.description: When Cargo Ship is detected, send a notification.

cargoShipLeft.description: When Cargo Ship left the map, send a notification.

cargoShipEgress.description: When Cargo Ship enters egress stage, send a notification.

patrolHelicopterDetected.description: When Patrol Helicopter is detected, send a notification.

patrolHelicopterLeft.description: When Patrol Helicopter left the map, send a notification.

patrolHelicopterDestroyed.description: When Patrol Helicopter gets destroyed, send a notification.

bradleyApcDestroyed.description: When Bradley APC gets destroyed, send a notification.

bradleyApcShouldRespawn.description: When Bradley APC should respawn, send a notification.

lockedCrateSpawnCargoShip.description: When a Locked Crate spawns on Cargo Ship, send a notification.

lockedCrateRespawnOilRig.description: When a Locked Crate respawns at Oil Rig, send a notification.

lockedCrateDroppedAtMonument.description: When a Locked Crate gets dropped at a monument, send a notification.

lockedCrateLeftCargoShip.description: When a Locked Crate disappears from Cargo Ship, send a notification.

lockedCrateLootedOilRig.description: When a Locked Crate gets looted at Oil Rig, send a notification.

lockedCrateMonumentLeft.description: When a Locked Crate disappears from a monument, send a notification.

lockedCrateMonumentDespawnWarning.description: When a Locked Crate at a monument is about to despawn, send a notification.

lockedCrateOilRigUnlocked.description: When a Locked Crate at Oil Rig is unlocked, send a notification.

heavyScientistCalled.description: When Heavy Scientists are called to Oil Rig, send a notification.

chinook47Detected.description: When a Chinook 47 enters the map, send a notification.

vendingMachineDetected.description: When a new Vending Machine is detected, send a notification.
